settings.heading: Appliqué by AlphaStyle
settings.text:
AlphaStyle has unveiled a premium line named "Appliqué" from its Winter lineup, and presents a capsule collection of premium goose down garments for everyday use. A full-blown lineup of contemporary outerwear using a technical fabrication in a high shine water resistant weave, while applying distinctive details to each one. The jacket's construction is kept minimal to emphasize its lustrous embellishments. Combining premium goose down insulation and lustrous nylon laque, with other notable functional details include hand-warmer pockets, thumbhole cuff and secure fidlock closure, and a smartphone pocket located on the inside front with a smart touch TPU window, allows for full use of the touch screen without removing the phone from the pocket.
All pieces embodies a clean, minimal design that slots easily into any wardrobe. Completing each piece with a rubberised "Appliqué by AlphaStyle" badges, all on a jacket that arrives in a snug fit, while the insulation of the parka is built up of 100% responsible down sources, ideal for throughout the impending winter months. The collection with unisex design comes in five colorways and can withstand temperatures as low as -22degrees Fahrenheit.
